markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Silverfish Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1614)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

It's uncommon for silverfish to congregate in sufficient numbers to constitute a swarm, but forgotten libraries or similar out-of-the-way places might harbor a multitude of the voracious pests.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Silverfish Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1614)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 84</row>

**Perception** +5; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** -5

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 13 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +4 

</row>

**HP** 9

**Immunities**
precision, [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=36)

**Resistances**
physical 2

**Weaknesses**
area damage 2, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 2

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet, climb 20 feet

**Swarming Bites** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each enemy in the silverfish swarm's space takes 1d4 piercing damage (DC 14 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save). A creature that fails its save is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34).

**Voracious Consumption**   (1 minute) A silverfish swarm consumes up to 1 Bulk of paper, cloth, or similar material. It can consume up to 4 Bulk each day.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-289" />
name: Silverfish Swarm
